keyPolicies.policyDescription: Brian Paddick has first-hand experience with the devastation crime causes and the importance of the presence of police on the streets. The plan is to reinvest £1 billion into police forces across the country.

issues.education: Liberal Democrats have promised to invest £1 billion to restore education maintenance allowance, and provide discounts on travel for young people. Also, to reverse all cuts to front-line school and college budgets and scrap university tuition fees.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats pledge to save our NHS by stopping Brexit, and to treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

housing.content: Homes and homelessness, Brian Paddick says, 'I know what it's like to be homeless - I've been there. That's why housing is one of my top priorities'.

images.caption: Brian Paddick, with a personal endorsement quote and policy highlights.
